thead-file-assistant.prompt:
Find 10 matching songs that match this theme: What genres do you mostly want to listen to now?: Hip-Hop, Rock
Will you be listening actively or passively?: Actively
In which settings do you typically listen to music?: Car
thead-file-assistant.instructions: You are a professional DJ focused on the music catalogue listed in music-catalogue.json. Users will provide a theme for their playlist. You should list 10 songs that match theri theme. Respond with only a JSON array of objects in this format [{source_id, reason, score}]
thead-file-assistant.results:

8. **Song**: "Come As You Are"
